books.author: by Greg Iles
books.description: Penn Cage, now the mayor of Natchez, Miss., investigates the secrets of his family and the South in order to save his and his father’s lives in the conclusion to the Natchez Burning trilogy.
books.name: MISSISSIPPI BLOOD

books.author: by William P. Young
books.description: A man whose daughter was abducted is invited to an isolated shack, apparently by God.
books.name: THE SHACK

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: Viktor returns to Sea Haven to see the wife whose stepfather he killed.
books.name: BOUND TOGETHER

books.author: by C. J. Box
books.description: Newly released from prison, Dallas Cates tries to exact revenge on the Wyoming game warden Joe Pickett, who put him there.
books.name: VICIOUS CIRCLE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: An unlikely relationship is put to the test.
books.name: IF NOT FOR YOU

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Linda Lael Miller
books.description: The woman Mace saved a decade ago returns, as does her vengeance-bent attacker.
books.name: FOREVER A HERO

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman is haunted by her father’s crimes as she tries to pursue love and her work as a photographer.
books.name: THE OBSESSION

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by J. A. Jance
books.description: Ali Reynolds pursues a man who manipulates the children of suicides into killing themselves in the 15th novel in the series.
books.name: MAN OVERBOARD

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In the Republic of Gilead's dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A canine narrator undergoes a series of reincarnations.
books.name: A DOG'S PURPOSE

books.author: by Martha Hall Kelly
books.description: A story of three women’s lives during and after World War II.
books.name: LILAC GIRLS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, searches for the truth about his mother, who disappeared 30 years ago.
books.name: NO MAN'S LAND
